definitions: Strike (a person or an animal) repeatedly and violently so as to hurt or injure them, typically with a hand, a weapon, or an implement.
Overcome (an opponent or rival) in a game, contest, or fight.
Succeed in being better than and overcoming (an opponent) in a game or other competitive situation.
Stir (ingredients) vigorously with a fork or whisk to make them smooth, frothy, or introduce air.
Of a bird's wings or heart Make a regular, rhythmic sound or movement.
examples: He beat the dog with a stick.
Our team beat them by two points.
Beat the eggs until they are frothy.
My heart began to beat faster.
